statements: SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, amount, transaction_date FROM suspicious_transactions;
SELECT account_id, amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE flag_reason = 'Fraud';
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM suspicious_transactions;
SELECT MIN(amount) AS min_amount, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM suspicious_transactions;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE account_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND flagged_by_user = 'Admin'
SELECT account_id, flag_reason FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 AND flag_reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY account_id ASC
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE flagged_by_user = 'Fraud' AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC
SELECT account_id, amount, transaction_date FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 200 AND flag_reason LIKE '%Suspicious%' ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE flagged = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_time FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE user_id = 'a1b2c3d4';
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE flagged = true ORDER BY amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_time FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE flagged = false ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM suspicious_transactions GROUP BY transaction_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT th.transaction_id, th.transaction_time, st.amount FROM transaction_history th INNER JOIN suspicious_transactions st ON th.transaction_id = st.transaction_id WHERE th.user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY st.amount ASC, th.transaction_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM flagging_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM flagging_transactions WHERE suspicious_flag = true;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM flagged_users;
SELECT rule_description FROM flagging_rules WHERE rule_status = true;
SELECT user_name, user_email, flag_reason FROM flagged_users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date, suspicious_flag FROM flagging_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM flagged_users WHERE user_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM flagging_transactions JOIN flagged_users ON flagging_transactions.transaction_id = flagged_users.user_id WHERE flag_reason = 'Fraudulent Activity'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM flagged_users WHERE flag_reason IS NOT NULL
SELECT rule_description FROM flagging_rules WHERE rule_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions_tracking ORDER BY updated_at DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, tracking_status FROM transactions_tracking WHERE tracking_status = 'pending';
SELECT transaction_id, flag_reason FROM flagged_transactions WHERE flagged_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount, flag_reason FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE flag_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM transactions_tracking WHERE tracking_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY updated_at DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, flag_reason FROM flagged_transactions WHERE flagged_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY flagged_at;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT flag_id, flag_reason, flagger_id FROM flags ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.timestamp, c.name AS customer_name FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IN ('1234567890', '0987654321');
SELECT flag_id, flag_reason FROM flags INNER JOIN flag_mappings ON flags.flag_id = flag_mappings.flag_id WHERE flags.flag_id = 1;

SELECT transactions.*, flags.flag_reason FROM transactions INNER JOIN flag_mappings ON transactions.transaction_id = flag_mappings.transaction_id INNER JOIN flags ON flag_mappings.flag_id = flags.flag_id WHERE flags.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';

SELECT customers.name AS customer_name, flags.flag_reason FROM customers LEFT JOIN flags ON customers.customer_id = flags.flagger_id WHERE customers.address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customers.name ASC;
